# Wellcome

Thank you for visiting my personal webpage.

I am Mojtaba Masoudinejad (Farsi: مجتبی مسعودی نژاد); a researcher originally from [Dezfool/Dezful](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dezful) in southwest [Iran](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iran), living in [Germany](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany). Currently I am working as a senior Machine Learning Engineer for [Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence](https://www.bosch-ai.com) at [Robert Bosch GmbH](https://www.bosch.com/).
